org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui

Class UserSettingsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui.UserSettingsWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class UserSettingsWindow
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    This class represents a window to manage the user settings. These settings will be stored in User.users. The user management is only applying if anonymous login is disable (users have to log in).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raphael Stoeckli (29.10.2014)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Method to load the data from User.users.

      • setNewUser

        private void setNewUser()
        Metod to prepare the form for inserting a new user. This method adds no new user to the list. Use createNewUser() for this task

      • setCurrentUser

        private void setCurrentUser(User user)
        Method fills the data from the defined user into the form. If no user (null) was specified setNewUser() will be called
        Parameters:
        user - User to process

      • userListValueChanged

        private void userListValueChanged(javax.swing.event.ListSelectionEvent evt)

      • usernameFieldKeyReleased

        private void usernameFieldKeyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
        Method to tigger the action of changing the user name. This method is to decide whether the buttons to add, alter or remove a user are enabled or disabled
        Parameters:
        evt - Action event of the calling UI element
